column2: Inplace renaming of elements from different Psi trees

column3: Current implementation does not allow inplace renaming when related elements are in different subtrees of a MultiPsi file. This should fix this
it was disabled intentionally to avoid performance problems during inplace rename inside jsp. What issue do you fix?
No issues. Just didn't know it was disabled intentionally. Was surprised that inplace not working in different psi trees.
It is tricky to predict all consequences of such change, hopefully we would rewrite this code one day and there won't be such restrictions anymore. Sorry for that
Allows to use MemberInplaceRenamer when elements are in different Psi¡­
